title: NORDIC SIEGE DEFENSE - Mount and Blade: Warband Gameplay {Siege Event}
description:
Mount and Blade: Warband Gameplay - Time for another Call to Arms Event.  We tried to play capture the flag, but it did not play out so well, so we did a last minute siege.  We are the Nords, and lionheart and his arm are attacking :D Enjoy the Video

Lionheart's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIeaxRCoSLFLHvrCInghqcw

Chadtopia did a Cast of the battle check it out: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=79jvbSpHce0&feature=youtu.be

Find out more about Call to Arms here:
Mount and Blade Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=3830559
Call to Arms Steam Group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/calltoarmsmountandblade
Email: calltoarmsmountandblade@gmail.com 

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
